Content: Units should be capable off accumulating movement points, in case they
need to go on a tile that is to expensive. (Example: Mc Slowass
Infatrydivison has 2 Movement points per turn and wishes to go on a
mountain costing 6 movement points. SO Mc Slowass uses the prepare
movement action for 2 turns and moves on the mountain in the 3rd turn.)
There should be an upper limit. An alternative would be to start the
movement and keep track of it via a status modifier.
